resources.string: Please fill in the journal entry
Talk about how you relabelled your habit
Talk about how you reframed your habit
Talk about how you refocused your habit
Talk about how you revalued your habit
The relabel step involves being mindful and recognizing negative thoughts related to the habit.
The reframe step involves changing perspective about a pattern and evaluating whether it\'s harmful.
The refocus step is the part where you thing of positive habits that can keep you away from the negative ones.
The revalue step is where you reflect on your progress.
Save and move to next step
